title: Unit 7: Going Away - Comprehensive Test
description: Test de vocabulario y expresiones conversacionales sobre viajes, equipaje y consejos de viaje

questions.question: What do you need to travel to another country?
It's important _____ get a visa before traveling.
When someone suggests something you like, you can say:
A bathing suit is something you wear when swimming.
Traduce: '¿Por qué no buscas un vuelo barato en línea?'
questions.answer: Why don't you go online to find a cheap flight?

questions.question: What does 'go backpacking' mean?
options: To travel with only a backpack
questions.answer: To travel with only a backpack

questions.question: You should probably _____ some research before your trip.
Traduce: 'Me estoy divirtiendo mucho aquí en París.'
questions.answer: I'm having a great time here in Paris

questions.question: Toiletries include items like shampoo, soap, and toothpaste.
What should you take on a camping trip?
Traduce: 'Deberías cambiar dinero antes del viaje.'
questions.answer: You should change money before the trip

questions.question: Maybe you should _____ a few days off for your vacation.
When you don't like a suggestion, you can say:
Traduce: 'Es fácil encontrar una ganga si buscas bien.'
questions.answer: It's easy to find a bargain if you look carefully
